title: TRACLabs
info: Worked with NASA to produce a graphical user interface for moon rover paths. The interface is currently used by both NASA and TRACLabs employees to determine most efficient paths in areas of interest.

title: Duke University
info: Mentor four students each semester for Computer Science 308 - Software Design and Implementation -- which includes regular meetings to analyze code design and effectiveness, along with grading students' assignments.

title: Coursera
info: Helped design and improve Duke Coursera's "Solving Problems with Software" class, that introduces students to programming in Java.

title: Duke University
info: Tutored fellow undergraduate students in Computer Science 101, where students learn the basics of Python.
